name: Gianrico Farrugia
text: #MolecularImaging techniques are combining and evolving so we can visualize, in a whole human, a single molecule, so we can pinpoint disease at the cellular level and give patients exactly the care they need and avoid treatments they don't need. @davos

name: Gianrico Farrugia
text: At @MayoClinic, our model of research is focusing on answering questions raised in the clinic, and taking research from discovery to translation through clinical trials and new technologies, and then application to patient care. @davos

name: Gianrico Farrugia
text: Health care institutions must collaborate with other sectors and help raise up the standard of treatment across large swaths of patients, as well as drive down costs and drive out waste in the health care system. @davos #sharedfuture

name: Gianrico Farrugia
text: At @MayoClinic, 500+ physicians, scientists and engineers are using the @OptumLabs data set to analyze what works, implement it in our practice, and publish results to share worldwide. We call this the science of health care delivery. @davos #sharedfuture

name: Gianrico Farrugia
text: With @OptumLabs, @MayoClinic is analyzing data from 150M patients to improve all aspects of care. We have already obtained answers in 5 minutes on subjects that normally would take a 3-5 year trial. @davos

text: Data shows more than 1 in 3 people now use wearable devices to monitor things like exercise, heart rate and sleep. @davos
